name: get_scores_for_given_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool football_score_api.
Tool description: Get football live scores for today be it any match 
The scores are divided based on the league and you can fetch the data for all the leagues 

This also gives you flexibility to know and find the matches and scores between teams for any other given date as well
API description: If you want to know the list of football matches for a given date and what was their scores you can use this API.
All this api needs is the date input in the format %Y-%m-%d.
Eg:- 2022-12-01

date.description: The date for which to fetch the football scores, in the format %Y-%m-%d (e.g., '2022-12-01').
